label: provenance
comment: An array of Provenance objects providing details on the origin of components or ingredients of the product batch.

rangeIncludes.comment: The Provenance class encapsulates details about the origin or source of components or ingredients in a product, including the country of origin and the percentage composition.

domainIncludes.comment: The ProductBatch class holds information related to a specific batch of products, including manufacturing details, sustainability claims and provenance information.
